Summary: Was out on FTX for army training.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Jackson
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswas in my AT4 hole with battle buddy, was my watch so he was sleeping, was a full moon or close to it, looked up and saw a object in sky moving very slowly, woke battle buddy up and asked him if he knew what it could be, he said he didn't know, so i was kinda freaked out, it wasn't making any noise, and was moving to slow to be a b-52, not to mention to quiet, there were 3 lights on each end of it, look like a perfect triangle, if i recall correctly the lights were a white color, they were a constant glow, no pulsing or shifting.. still freaks me out to this day,
